trans-unit.source: Provides a top-level mapping layer between a COM object and a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 COM 物件和 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor" /> 之間提供最上層對應圖層。

trans-unit.source: This API is now obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 現在已過時。

trans-unit.source: Add a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider> to handle a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.ComObjectType%2A> instead.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider>處理<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.ComObjectType%2A>改為。

trans-unit.source: The component to get attributes for.
trans-unit.target: 要為其取得屬性的元件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the attributes for the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之元件的屬性。

trans-unit.source: A collection of attributes for <paramref name="component" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="component" /> 之屬性的集合。

trans-unit.source: This API is now obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 現在已過時。

trans-unit.source: The non-obsolete alternative is <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.ComObjectType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 非過時的替代方式是 <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.ComObjectType%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The component to get the class name for.
trans-unit.target: 要為其取得類別名稱的元件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the class name for the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之元件的類別名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the class that corresponds with <paramref name="component" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="component" /> 對應之類別的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This API is now obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 現在已過時。

trans-unit.source: The non-obsolete alternative is <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.ComObjectType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 非過時的替代方式是 <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.ComObjectType%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The component to get the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter" /> for.
trans-unit.target: 要為其取得 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter" /> 的元件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type converter for the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之元件的型別轉換子。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter" /> for <paramref name="component" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="component" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter" />。

trans-unit.source: This API is now obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 現在已過時。

trans-unit.source: The non-obsolete alternative is <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.ComObjectType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 非過時的替代方式是 <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.ComObjectType%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The component to get the default event for.
trans-unit.target: 要為其取得預設事件的元件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default event for the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之元件的預設事件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor" /> that represents <paramref name="component" />'s default event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor" />，表示 <paramref name="component" /> 的預設值。

trans-unit.source: This API is now obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 現在已過時。

trans-unit.source: The non-obsolete alternative is <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.ComObjectType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 非過時的替代方式是 <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.ComObjectType%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The component to get the default property for.
trans-unit.target: 要取得預設屬性的元件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default property for the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之元件的預設屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> that represents <paramref name="component" />'s default property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />，表示 <paramref name="component" /> 的預設屬性。

trans-unit.source: This API is now obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 現在已過時。

trans-unit.source: The non-obsolete alternative is <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.ComObjectType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 非過時的替代方式是 <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.ComObjectType%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The component to get the editor for.
trans-unit.target: 要為其取得編輯器的元件。

trans-unit.source: The base type of the editor for <c>component</c>.
trans-unit.target: <c>component</c> 之編輯器的基底類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the editor for the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之元件的編輯器。

trans-unit.source: The editor for <paramref name="component" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="component" /> 的編輯器。

trans-unit.source: This API is now obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 現在已過時。

trans-unit.source: The non-obsolete alternative is <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.ComObjectType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 非過時的替代方式是 <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.ComObjectType%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the events for the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之元件的事件。

trans-unit.source: The component to get events for.
trans-unit.target: 要為其取得事件的元件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the events for the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之元件的事件。

trans-unit.source: A collection of event descriptors for <paramref name="component" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="component" /> 之事件描述元的集合。

trans-unit.source: This API is now obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 現在已過時。

trans-unit.source: The non-obsolete alternative is <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.ComObjectType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 非過時的替代方式是 <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.ComObjectType%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The component to get events for.
trans-unit.target: 要為其取得事件的元件。

trans-unit.source: The attributes used to filter events.
trans-unit.target: 用來篩選事件的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the events with the specified attributes for the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之元件的事件和指定的屬性。

trans-unit.source: A collection of event descriptors for <paramref name="component" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="component" /> 之事件描述元的集合。

trans-unit.source: This API is now obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 現在已過時。

trans-unit.source: The non-obsolete alternative is <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.ComObjectType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 非過時的替代方式是 <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.ComObjectType%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The component to get the name of.
trans-unit.target: 要取得其名稱的元件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定元件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of <paramref name="component" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="component" /> 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This API is now obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 現在已過時。

trans-unit.source: The non-obsolete alternative is <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.ComObjectType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 非過時的替代方式是 <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.ComObjectType%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The component to get events for.
trans-unit.target: 要為其取得事件的元件。

trans-unit.source: The attributes used to filter properties.
trans-unit.target: 用來篩選屬性 (Property) 的屬性 (Attribute)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the properties with the specified attributes for the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之元件的屬性 (Property) 和指定的屬性 (Attribute)。

trans-unit.source: A collection of property descriptors for <paramref name="component" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="component" /> 之屬性描述元的集合。

trans-unit.source: This API is now obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 現在已過時。

trans-unit.source: The non-obsolete alternative is <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.ComObjectType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 非過時的替代方式是 <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.ComObjectType%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the specified property.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The object to which the property belongs.
trans-unit.target: 屬性所屬的物件。

trans-unit.source: The dispatch identifier.
trans-unit.target: 分派識別項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />, passed by reference, that represents whether the property was retrieved.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> (以傳址 (By Reference) 方式傳遞)，表示是否已擷取屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the property that has the specified dispatch identifier.
trans-unit.target: 取得含有指定之分派識別項 (Dispatch Identifier) 的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the property that has the specified dispatch identifier.
trans-unit.target: 含有指定之分派識別項 (Dispatch Identifier) 的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: This API is now obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 現在已過時。

trans-unit.source: The non-obsolete alternative is <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.ComObjectType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 非過時的替代方式是 <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.ComObjectType%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The object to which the property belongs.
trans-unit.target: 屬性所屬的物件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />, passed by reference, that represents whether the property was retrieved.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> (以傳址 (By Reference) 方式傳遞)，表示是否已擷取屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the property that has the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 取得具有指定名稱之屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the property that has the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定名稱之屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: This API is now obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 現在已過時。

trans-unit.source: The non-obsolete alternative is <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.ComObjectType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 非過時的替代方式是 <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.ComObjectType%2A>。
